Uses of Interface
jpo.PictureInfoChangeListener

Uses of PictureInfoChangeListener in jpo
 

Classes in jpo that implement PictureInfoChangeListener
 class PictureInfoEditor
          class that creates a JFrame and displays the fields of a picture.
 class PictureViewer
          PictureViewer manages a window which diplays a picture.
 class Thumbnail
          Thumbnail displays a visual representation of the specified node.
 class ThumbnailDescriptionJPanel
          ThumbnailDescriptionJPanel is a JPanel that displays the metadata of a thumbnail.
 

Methods in jpo with parameters of type PictureInfoChangeListener
 void PictureInfo.addPictureInfoChangeListener(PictureInfoChangeListener listener)
          Method to register the listening object of the status events.
 void PictureInfo.removePictureInfoChangeListener(PictureInfoChangeListener listener)
          Method to register the listening object of the status events.
